channel.title: Marc Jacobs on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Marc Jacobs on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sofia Coppola Prepares to Premiere Her Intimate Portrait of Friend Marc Jacobs in Venice, But “I Didn’t Want It to Be About Me”
item.description: Coppola and American fashion designer Marc Jacobs spoke at a Venice Film Festival press conference for their new documentary ‘Marc By Sofia’.
